summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to a grant from the Federal Transit Administration allocated through the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009; accepting the grant funds, authorizing the Mayor or his designee to execute related agreements, increasing appropriations for the Seattle Department of Transportation and Seattle Center in the 2009 Adopted Budget, including the 2009-14 Capital Improvement Program, and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
